headline: Why This Beaten-Down Medical Device Stock Could Be Your Best Investment for the Next 5 Years
summary: DexCom has barely scratched the surface of its niche in the diabetes market.  Medical device specialist DexCom (NASDAQ: DXCM) has encountered significant headwinds in the past year.  The company's financial results haven't been quite up to the market's standards, and broader market volatility caused by President Donald Trump's trade policies isn't helping either.
